com.yahoo.sketches.quantiles

Class DoublesUnionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.sketches.quantiles.DoublesUnionBuilder

  • public class DoublesUnionBuilder
extends Object
    For building a new QuantilesSketch Union operation.
    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoublesUnionBuilder()
      Constructor for building a new UnionBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DoublesUnion build()
      Returns a virgin Union object with the default k
      DoublesUnion build(DoublesSketch sketch)
      Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the given sketch to be used as a union target and will be modified.
      DoublesUnion build(Memory srcMem)
      Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given Memory image of a QuantilesSketch.
      DoublesUnion copyBuild(DoublesSketch sketch)
      Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given sketch.
      DoublesUnionBuilder setK(int k)
      Sets the parameter k that determines the accuracy and size of the sketch

    • Method Detail

      • setK

        public DoublesUnionBuilder setK(int k)
        Sets the parameter k that determines the accuracy and size of the sketch
        Parameters:
        k - determines the accuracy and size of the sketch.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public DoublesUnion build()
        Returns a virgin Union object with the default k
        Returns:
        a virgin Union object with the default k

      • build

        public DoublesUnion build(DoublesSketch sketch)
        Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the given sketch to be used as a union target and will be modified. If you do not want the given sketch to be modified use the copyBuild(DoublesSketch).
        Parameters:
        sketch - a QuantilesSketch that will be used as a target of subsequent union operations.
        Returns:
        a Union object

      • build

        public DoublesUnion build(Memory srcMem)
        Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given Memory image of a QuantilesSketch. A reference to this Memory image is not retained.
        Parameters:
        srcMem - a Memory image of a QuantilesSketch
        Returns:
        a Union object

      • copyBuild

        public DoublesUnion copyBuild(DoublesSketch sketch)
        Returns a Union object that has been initialized with the data from the given sketch.
        Parameters:
        sketch - A QuantilesSketch to be used as a source of data, but will not be modified.
        Returns:
        a Union object
